casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Luther Ray WILSON, Jr. No. 217P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of NC.

Dear Mr. Wilson:

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of April 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for a Writ to Appeal Barred Procedurally":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."
